description: Backend service for an AI troubleshoot agent using FastAPI and LangGraph with sub-agent orchestration.

userStories.title: Core API & Configuration Infrastructure
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a FastAPI service that loads agent configurations from a file so I can adjust behavior without changing code.
acceptanceCriteria: Configuration file defines Orchestrator model & system prompt
Configuration file defines List of Sub-Agents and their tools

userStories.title: Orchestrator Agent with LangGraph
userStories.description: As a user, I want the system to understand my request and automatically select the correct expert agent.
acceptanceCriteria: Orchestrator implemented as a LangGraph node
Orchestrator analyzes user input and selects 'Next Node' or responds directly
Routing logic involves LLM decision making

userStories.title: Cisco ACI Troubleshooting Sub-Agent
userStories.description: As a network engineer, I want a specialized agent that can query and troubleshoot Cisco ACI structures.
acceptanceCriteria: Agent has access to mocked/stubbed ACI tools
Agent receives context from Orchestrator and returns troubleshooting steps
Configurable via the main config file

userStories.title: Streaming Thoughts and Responses
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the 'thoughts' of the agent in real-time to know it wasn't stuck.
acceptanceCriteria: Stream includes structured events for thoughts and responses
